experiences.description: Working in the Equities Risk and P&L team on intraday risk systems.
achievements: Became SME on all intraday risk stack components within a year; consulted on major feature implementations
Implemented YTD, MTD, MTM, and Late Trade P&L for global SWAPS migration; optimised risk engine, reducing latency by 50%
Built support tools aggregating logged data and generating graphs, reducing issue diagnosis time from over an hour to 5 minutes
Collaborated with application support and traders on prod support rota to identify, fix, test, and deploy solutions
Trained junior team members and an intern on systems and processes

Seconded to prime brokerage team: resolved performance issues (75% latency reduction), added Java aggregator features, and delivered risk limit breach workflow (TypeScript/React/Flask) in under two weeks

experiences.description: Placed in the Equity Linked Technology team working closely with equities traders
achievements: Created framework and automated reports for identifying and resolving compute grid inefficiencies in intraday risk and P&L calculations
Developed expertise in data science, grid load balancing optimisation, and complex codebase navigation
Refined skills in Python, project management, and technical presentation

experiences.description: Worked in the National Security business unit for law enforcement clients including CEOPs
achievements: Created a tool for generating language recognition machine learning models
Built an automated, containerised dark web scraping tool
